name: The Tomb of Argazfell
description:
In this visual novel you play as Davinel, a guard on an expedition to an ancient tomb in a far away desert.
You will journey with your childhood friend Mirrla and meet other people on the way.
Treasure and danger await you in the tomb.

Features:
3 Endings
6 H-scenes
Type: Visual Novel
Length: About 2 hours
Language: English
